callToAction.text: Learn more about our wide selection of specialised waters and more

footer.description: Active in pharmaceutical, medical, and cosmetic fields, the Inopro group is a leading marketer of specialised waters in Quebec and Canada.
footer.subscribe: Subscribe to our Newsletter to receive updates via email

leader.title: Leader
leader.description: The Inopro group is a leader in commercializing sterile specialized waters, renowned for its commitment to excellence and advancements.

distribution.title: Distribution
distribution.description: The Inopro group is a global leader in commercializing innovative pharmaceutical products, setting new industry standards worldwide.

quality.title: Quality Products
quality.description: With unwavering dedication to unparalleled quality standards, Inopro asserts its leadership in the market, earning global trust and respect.

service.title: Service
service.description: Inopro makes the difference with personalized and impeccable customer service cementing its reputation as an industry leader.

inopro.title: Wound irrigation with
inopro.description: Make your life easier and use Inopro U.S.P purified deionized sterile water to remove bacteria with mechanical pressure up to 15 psi.

irrigo.description: Irrigo is the first sterile sodium chloride solution especially designed to meet nurses needs. And it is now available to everyone!

irrilin.description: Irrilin is an Aqueous Solution designed for wound cleaning and irrigation. Ideal to clean the skin and tissues as well as piercings and tattoos.

sucro24.title: with the help of
sucro24.description1: Ideal to calm and comfort babies, Sucro24 is a preservative and alcohol free maple syrup based solution that help reduce the impact of painful procedures.

irrilag.title: First-Aid gel
irrilag.description: Made with colloïdal silver, Irrilag is designed to help treat minor skin infections, and to protect & help temporarily relieve itching and minor skin irritations.

sopuro.description1: A revolutionary antibacterial hand sanitizer perfect for any occasion. It features
sopuro.description2: an Aloe vera enriched moisturizing gel in three different fragrances to choose from.

global.title: The leaders in
global.description1: The Inopro group is an established leader in the commercialisation of innovative pharmaceutical products on a global scale.

aboutComponent.title: About Us
aboutComponent.description: The Inopro Group is a leading marketer of specialised waters in Quebec and Canada. Its wide distribution network, its high quality standards as well as its impeccable and personalised service are just some of the points on which the company has built its reputation.

chooseUsComponent.title: Why choose us
chooseUsComponent.description: Choose Inopro Group for a better quality of life. We offer specialized sterile waters for pharmaceutical, medical, and cosmetic needs, available in pharmacies and recommended by health experts.

leader.title: Leader
leader.description: The Inopro group is established as a leader in the commercialisation of sterile specialised waters.

distribution.title: Distribution
distribution.description: Has a wide international distribution network.

products.title: Quality products
products.description: Sets itself apart by its unmatched quality standards in the market.

service.title: Service
service.description: Makes the difference through its personalised and impeccable customer service.

callUsComponent.title: Call us to learn more about our selection of products
callUsComponent.subtitle: Contact Us Today

messageUsComponents.title: Drop Us Message for Any Query

contactUsPage.subtitle: Let Us Help You
contactUsPage.title: Please contact us if you have any questions

productsPage.description: Contact us if you have any queries or want to learn more about our selection of products.

irrigo.title: Irrigo
irrigo.descriptionOne: Is the first sterile sodium chloride solution especially designed to meet nurses needs. And it is now available to everyone!
irrigo.descriptionTwo: A wound irrigation requires on average 60 ml of solution. So why would you buy bulky to carry and store formats? Choose an all-in-one solution, making obsolete the use of cabarets, cannulae and syringes. With Irrigo, wound irrigation is more efficient and life is simpler!

features.title: Product features
features.feature3: Guarantees a pressure of 0 to 15 psi
features.feature4: Wounds, bites, scratches, scrapes, piercings, etc.

productDescription1.title: Ideal for first aid kits
productDescription1.description: Dislodges bacteria with low and high mechanical pressure from 0 to15 psi.
productDescription1.feature1: Safe to use, reduces risk of contamination

productDescription2.title: The right solution for your needs
productDescription2.description: Irrigo is a sterile solution for gently cleaning wounds, scratches, scrapes and bites. It removes foreign matter to promote healing and prevent infection.
productDescription2.mainFeature1: Safe to use, reduces risk of contamination
productDescription2.feature1: Meets Canadian best practices for wound cleansing
